content: show your skills on this richly-designed crochet afghan that adds color and textural interest to a room your sampler afghan begins with our self-striping caron anniversary cakes yarn for a colorful effect without changing yarns pattern is a true delight for the more experienced hand as you crochet a variety of textured stitches including single_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet chain crochet treble front post bobbles and clusters show off your work of art in any room and wait for the compliments to pour in
